name: Survival Game Tester
description:
Controls:
W A S D Movement

Point and left click to shoot.

Shift to run

Features:

Very early access FPS.

4 Enemies:

Bears: Slow

Bunny: Fast.

Elephant: Doesn't damage you, slow. but pushes you around the place

Boss Elephant: spawns at 500 + points

Powerups:

Health Powerup

5% chance every tick if player is lower than 80 health + has 10 kills.

Planning to update with more stuff later.
